code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{logout}from'../services/authService';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LogoutButton=_ref=>{let{className=''}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogout=()=>{logout();navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"logout-btn ".concat(className),style:{background:'linear-gradient(45deg, #f44336, #d32f2f)',border:'1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3)',color:'white',padding:'8px 12px',borderRadius:'6px',cursor:'pointer',fontSize:'0.9rem',transition:'all 0.3s ease'},children:"\uD83D\uDEAA Logout"});};export default LogoutButton;
